properties.Name: LineOfCredit
properties.Description: An agreement with a financial institution in which the financial institution agrees to loan money to the legal entity on demand up to a specific amount and for a specific period.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description:
The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

In this case it is the business, organization or legal entity whose books are being recorded and financial statements presented.

Columns.Name: LineOfCreditProvidingPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: LineOfCreditPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period starting date for which the line of credit is established.

Columns.Name: LineOfCreditPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period ending date for which the line of credit is established.

Columns.Name: LineOfCreditAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of the line of credit.
